attributes.action: Call for a windfall tax on oil and energy producers to ease the energy crisis
attributes.additional_details: The evidence suggests that billions of pounds are being used to inflate share prices at the expense of the British public
attributes.background: Call for a windfall tax on oil and energy producers to ease the energy crisis

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar.  If you'd like a different tax amount, you could start a new petition setting out what level you'd like to see

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607983
